name: Shapez (Hundi)
description:
Shapez is an endless game made in 2 days about simple shapes. The game was made for GeoJam 2021 with the theme switch in mind. -----------How to play:-----------

Use A/S/D or RIGHT/DOWN/LEFT to select the appropriate shape and press SPACE at the right moment to get points.

-----------Credits:-----------

The font style that was used is made by Astigmatic

---------------------------------

I did not have enough time to add sounds or a high contrast mode. But I will add that later. 

My score is 327 points, try me beach (I know that is not written correctly).
